Firstly I would like to say thank you on over 15k plays on my simulation game "Chat-Snap". The link here: http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/cji4hxukqumhcpqx2awbyg/chat-snap

So I recently saw the "App" category, I have been trying to figure out how to turn my games into apps, but it hasn't been working out for me. Is there anyway someone can help me with this? I would appreciate it a lot.

Thanks,
WayTooCasualGamer
